name: py-flake8
description:
Flake8 is a wrapper around PyFlakes, pep8 and Ned Batchelder's McCabe
script.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pycodestyle
dependencies.description:
pycodestyle is a tool to check your Python code against some of the
style conventions in PEP 8. Note: formerly called pep8.

dependencies.name: py-pyflakes
dependencies.description: A simple program which checks Python source files for errors.

dependencies.name: py-entrypoints
dependencies.description: Discover and load entry points from installed packages.

dependencies.name: py-mccabe
dependencies.description: Ned's script to check McCabe complexity.

dependencies.name: py-typing
dependencies.description:
This is a backport of the standard library typing module to Python
versions older than 3.6.

dependencies.name: py-configparser
dependencies.description:
This library brings the updated configparser from Python 3.5 to Python
2.6-3.5.

dependencies.name: py-functools32
dependencies.description:
Backport of the functools module from Python 3.2.3 for use on 2.7 and
PyPy.

dependent_to.name: py-flake8-polyfill
dependent_to.description:
flake8-polyfill is a package that provides some compatibility helpers
for Flake8 plugins that intend to support Flake8 2.x and 3.x
simultaneously.

dependent_to.name: py-azureml-train-core
dependent_to.description:
The azureml-train-core contains functionality used by azureml-train
metapackage.

dependent_to.name: py-pytest-flake8
dependent_to.description: pytest plugin to check FLAKE8 requirements.

dependent_to.name: py-motmetrics
dependent_to.description:
The py-motmetrics library provides a Python implementation of metrics
for benchmarking multiple object trackers (MOT).
